channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Marvel Afterthought, ‘Ironheart,’ Gets A Disappointing First Trailer
item.description: Marvel just aired the first-ever trailer for Ironheart on the same day the DCU’s Superman trailer drops, and it does not look great.

item.title: Big Oil Knew, Big Oil Lied: Fossil Fuel’s Long Strategy Of Deceit
item.description: A new UCS report reveals how fossil fuel giants spent decades disseminating climate disinformation, delaying action and fueling rising emissions and c...

item.title: Retail Transformation: In An AI World, Experience Is Still King
item.description: Technology enables organizations to not only keep up with their competition but gain an edge over them if they use technology in more effective ways.

item.title: There Will Never Be Another ‘Andor’
item.description: Andor may be the best piece of Star Wars content that's ever been made. But there are so many reasons why a show like this will never happen again.

item.title: 6 Investor Predictions For AI In 2025
item.description: Here are some insights from the investing bench about what AI markets will do in the year to come.

item.title: Effort and value
item.description: We expend effort. We create value. It’s easy to get confused about which one we’re going to ultimately be compensated for.

item.title: Energy and systems complexity

item.title: Infinity is not a number
item.description: Little kids get confused about this… just add a few more to a very big number, and you have infinity. Actually, infinity is a feeling and a concept bu...

item.title: Activation is not a secret
item.description: …but it’s often overlooked. A farmer might yearn for twice as much land. But it’s far more efficient to double the yield on the land he already has. M...

item.title: Expectations
